body_html:
BTW:

  1. I made many changes in both java and c, and they run normally with the 32-bit libtensorlite_jni.so/libneuralnetworks.so
  2. I did an extreme attempt,
    cd /home/benshi001
    grep armeabi-v7a * -r
    then remove all lines with armeabi-v7a
    but the bazel build still invoke armeabi-v7a build procedure

body:
BTW:
1. I made many changes in both java and c, and they run normally with the 32-bit libtensorlite_jni.so/libneuralnetworks.so
2. I did an extreme attempt,
cd /home/benshi001
grep armeabi-v7a * -r
then remove all lines with armeabi-v7a
but the bazel build still invoke armeabi-v7a build procedure
